MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: sokoban, warehouse, warehouse keeper, keeper, boxes, puzzle, so ko ban, javascript, dhtml, css, html, web, online, web based, level editor
English.Char_Desc_45: Sokoban alike game with level editor.
English.Char_Desc_80: Yasminuroban is an open source "Sokoban" alike game with a level editor.
English.Char_Desc_250: Yasminuroban is an open source "Sokoban" alike game totally written in DHTML (JavaScript, CSS and HTML) that uses keyboard. Includes level editor.
English.Char_Desc_450: Yasminuroban is an open source "Sokoban" alike game totally written in DHTML (JavaScript, CSS and HTML) that uses keyboard. Includes level editor. This cross-platform and cross-browser game was tested under BeOS, Linux, NetBSD, OpenBSD, FreeBSD, Windows and others.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Yasminuroban is an open source "Sokoban" alike game totally written in DHTML (JavaScript, CSS and HTML) that uses keyboard. Includes level editor. This cross-platform and cross-browser game was tested under BeOS, Linux, NetBSD, OpenBSD, FreeBSD, MacOS, Windows and others. Only you need a DHTML compatible web browser with JavaScript enabled to play it. You can edit your own levels with the level editor and play with it. Also, you can edit source code of the game and include more levels, change graphics, include improves, etc... You only need to maintain author name and don't change it. JavaScript is a interpreted language, like Java, Flash, Python, etc. But JavaScript doesn't need any plugin to install!

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: Prohibited to reproduce or modify without maintain original author's name
Permissions.EULA: Prohibited to reproduce or modify without maintain original author's name
